text: Xuzhi, yisilan jiao [de chongbai he shuncong] zhi wei an la. Naxie she an la er ling qiu baohu zhe [ouxiang] de ren [shuo]:“Women chongbai tamen [ouxiang], zhi weile tamen neng shi women jiejin an la.” An la bi jiang wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de. An la jue bu yindao shuohuang zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe.
